entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 09:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 50 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -27.1°C
Wind: NW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
